LanguageData.Orassan_Muscisian.title: Musicista
LanguageData.Orassan_Muscisian.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ama così tanto far musica che ha intrapreso una carriera di successo.
LanguageData.Orassan_Stylist.title: Stilista
LanguageData.Orassan_Stylist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] era {PAWN_gender ? uno:una} stilista. Chiacchierava con i clienti, tagliandogli accurataente i capelli, applicandogli archi tra le orecchie e rendendo migliore l'aspetto di chiunque sieda nella sua sedia.
LanguageData.Orassan_EcumenopolisA.title: Lavoratore dell'ecumenopoli
LanguageData.Orassan_EcumenopolisA.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] viveva in una città di dimensioni planetarie. [PAWN_pronoun] ha lavorato in un centro di produzione di massa insieme a migliaia o decine di migliaia di altri lavoratori.
LanguageData.Orassan_PsiPolice.title: Specialista
LanguageData.Orassan_PsiPolice.baseDescription: Nonostante le tendenze individualistiche degli Orassani, ci sono dei limiti a quanto uno può esprimersi senza oltrepassare il limite [PAWN_nameDef] era uno dei pochi specializzati che si occupava di incidenti che richiedevano un approccio più delicato rispetto alle forze di polizia generali, per frenare gli altri senza inibire l'individualità.
LanguageData.Orassan_PsiWarrior.title: Guerriero psionico
LanguageData.Orassan_PsiWarrior.baseDescription: Pochi orassiano dimostrano abilità psioniche latenti. [PAWN_nameDef] è un{PAWN_gender ? o:a} di questi. Una volta scoperto dall'impero, [PAWN_pronoun] è stato reclutato per diventare un guerriero psionico.
LanguageData.Orassan_Constructor.title: Costruttore
LanguageData.Orassan_Constructor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ama il suo lavoro, la costruzione di grandi strutture sia nello spazio, che su solida terra. Anche se la progettazione dell'edificio non è dipesa da [PAWN_pronoun], è orgoglios{PAWN_gender ? o:a} del suo lavoro.
LanguageData.Orassan_SEngineer.title: Ingegnere dello spazioporto
LanguageData.Orassan_SEngineer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ha lavorato sodo, giorno dopo giorno, studiando e aggiustando macchinari di ogni tipo che avevano bisogno di riparazioni nel suo spazioporto. Si è guadagnat{PAWN_gender ? o:a} la reputazione di poter riparare qualsiasi cosa venga portata alla sua officina, indipendentemente dall'origine.
LanguageData.Orassan_FR.title: Paramedico
LanguageData.Orassan_FR.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] si è spesso occupat{PAWN_gender ? o:a} di infortuni minori sul lavoro, fornendo assistenza di pronto intervento e di pronto soccorso per le piccole lesioni. Anche se raramente aveva a che fare con incidenti gravi, il suo lavoro {PAWN_gender ? gli:le} ha insegnato molto sul rattoppare le ferite.
LanguageData.Orassan_EcumenopolisB.title: Scienziato dell'ecumenopoli
LanguageData.Orassan_EcumenopolisB.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] viveva in una città di dimensioni planetarie. [PAWN_pronoun] lavorava in un enorme centro scientifico con migliaia di altri intellettuali.
LanguageData.Orassan_Miner.title: Specialista in materia di approvvigionamento di risorse
LanguageData.Orassan_Miner.baseDescription: Le risorse sono fondamentali per l'espansione, e [PAWN_nameDef] era un{PAWN_gender ? o:a} dei tanti incaricati alla raccolta. [PAWN_pronoun] andava ai depositi, preparava le attrezzature, e faceva quello che era necessario per ottenere il massimo da loro.
LanguageData.Orassan_Explorer.title: Ufficiale esploratore
LanguageData.Orassan_Explorer.baseDescription: L'esplorazione è sempre necessaria, che sia attraverso la superficie di un pianeta, giù nelle profondità dell'oceano, o fino negli strati più bui dello spazio. [PAWN_nameDef] era un{PAWN_gender ? o:a} che stava là fuori a cercare, tracciare, registrare e esplorare, trovando ogni sorta di cosa, da altre razze ai depositi di risorse.
LanguageData.Orassan_Terrorist.title: Terrorista
LanguageData.Orassan_Terrorist.baseDescription: There are many ways to express oneself, but [PAWN_nameDef] did so in a dangerous and illegal way. [PAWN_pronoun] spread terror in the [PAWN_nameDef] of their ideaology.
LanguageData.Orassan_Pirate.title: Pirata
LanguageData.Orassan_Pirate.baseDescription: There are many ways to express oneself, but [PAWN_nameDef] did so in a dangerous and illegal way. [PAWN_pronoun] spread terror in pursuit of material wealth.
LanguageData.Orassan_Mercenary.title: Mercenario
LanguageData.Orassan_Mercenary.baseDescription: While not a popular profession in the Orassan Empire, there are still those willing to do any job if the pay is right.
LanguageData.Orassan_Cultist.title: Cultista
LanguageData.Orassan_Cultist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of Dawn's Light, a religous cult that rebelled against the Orassan government near the begining of the Empire's space age with the help of newfound enemies of the Empire. The leader has since been killed, but the embers of the cult still flicker... awaiting to reignite.
LanguageData.Orassan_Crafter.title: Armaiolo
LanguageData.Orassan_Crafter.baseDescription: Any civilization finds themselves eventuially in war, either with themselves, or others. [PAWN_nameDef] was a designer of weapons of war, and [PAWN_pronoun], along with others of [PAWN_possessive] design team, made and improved weapons that have killed many, many people.
LanguageData.Orassan_Scientist.title: Scienziato
LanguageData.Orassan_Scientist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a researcher for the Orassan Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to discovering the unknown.
LanguageData.Orassan_XenoZoo.title: Guardiano dello Xenozoo
LanguageData.Orassan_XenoZoo.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] works at one of the many Xeno Zoos in the Orassan Empire and is very fond of animals.
LanguageData.Orassan_Colinizer.title: Colonizzatore
LanguageData.Orassan_Colinizer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is part of the effort to expand the Orassan Empire.
LanguageData.Orassan_Doctor.title: Dottore
LanguageData.Orassan_Doctor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to healing others.
LanguageData.Orassan_Soldier.title: Soldato
LanguageData.Orassan_Soldier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a soldier for the Orassan Empire.
LanguageData.Orassan_Ambassador.title: Ambasciatore
LanguageData.Orassan_Ambassador.baseDescription: With the largely acceptive opinion Orassans have with aliens, [PAWN_nameDef] took pride in [PAWN_possessive] work as a foreign ambassador. [PAWN_pronoun] regularly met, and kept goodwill with many xeno species.
LanguageData.Orassan_Officer.title: Ufficiale
LanguageData.Orassan_Officer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] leads squads of soldiers in combat.
LanguageData.Orassan_Nurse.title: Infermiere
LanguageData.Orassan_Nurse.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] assists doctors in tending to various patients.
LanguageData.Orassan_NavyCook.title: Cuoco di marina
LanguageData.Orassan_NavyCook.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as a chef in the Orassan navy.
LanguageData.Orassan_Shellshocked.title: Sopravvissuto
LanguageData.Orassan_Shellshocked.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the Orassan army. After serving on an invasion force against a rival army, [PAWN_pronoun] was the only survivor in their squad in a failed invasion attempt.
LanguageData.Orassan_Hydro.title: Operaio idroponico
LanguageData.Orassan_Hydro.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a giant hydroponics facility on one of the planets in the Orassan Empire to feed its many citizens. [PAWN_pronoun] was an expert in Plants food and maintaining the machinery that kept the facility operational.
LanguageData.Orassan_Slasher.title: Soldato di prima linea
LanguageData.Orassan_Slasher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as a frontline soldier, typically in close quarters combat.
LanguageData.Orassan_GeneWarrior.title: Guerriero geneticamente ingegnerizzato
LanguageData.Orassan_GeneWarrior.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a genetically engineered supersoldier for the Orassan Empire.
LanguageData.Orassan_GaiaA.title: Cittadino Gaia
LanguageData.Orassan_GaiaA.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on a Gaia planet; a planet perfectly suited for nearly any carbon based life form. [PAWN_pronoun] benifited from a near perfect enviroment to live and work in.
LanguageData.Orassan_Stripper.title: Danzatore esotico танцор
LanguageData.Orassan_Stripper.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at a nightclub and gave dances for patrons. Bouncers made sure that the patrons kept their hands to themselves. [PAWN_pronoun] was very proficient at getting tips.
LanguageData.Orassan_Pornstar.title: Star Olografica
LanguageData.Orassan_Pornstar.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is well known for their performance in adult Holovids.
LanguageData.Orassan_CapitalChild.title: Nato su Orassia
LanguageData.Orassan_CapitalChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on the capital planet of Orassia. [PAWN_pronoun] was born to a wealthy family that lived in a mountain side estate.
LanguageData.Orassan_GeneChild.title: Bambino Geneticamente Ingegnerizzato
LanguageData.Orassan_GeneChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was genetically engineered to be a perfect child.
LanguageData.Orassan_SpacerChild.title: Figlio del cosmo
LanguageData.Orassan_SpacerChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a space ship and spent most of their childhood on one ship or another. The close quarters meant that [PAWN_pronoun] had to be friendly with [PAWN_possessive] neighbors and had to know how to maintain the ship [PAWN_pronoun] was on.
LanguageData.Orassan_ColonyChild.title: Figlio di coloni
LanguageData.Orassan_ColonyChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a fledgling colony. They had to help the community grow and thrive.
LanguageData.Orassan_Kyle.title: Bullo
LanguageData.Orassan_Kyle.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bully. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed roughing up the other children, and was very good at avoiding getting caught.
LanguageData.Orassan_Rbully.title: Bullo pentito
LanguageData.Orassan_Rbully.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a bully, but then [PAWN_pronoun] messed with someone who fought back. The experience left [PAWN_objective] scarred, and [PAWN_pronoun] prefers to avoid fighting at all.
LanguageData.Orassan_Stargazer.title: Astronomo
LanguageData.Orassan_Stargazer.baseDescription: The stars always facinated [PAWN_nameDef], and knowing that one day [PAWN_pronoun] could go out amongst them drove [PAWN_objective] through [PAWN_possessive] education at a very directed pace.
LanguageData.Orassan_MilitaryC.title: Bambino militarizzato
LanguageData.Orassan_MilitaryC.baseDescription: The Orassan Navy always facinated [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] often visited military bases and watched weapon tests.
LanguageData.Orassan_GaiaChild.title: Bambino Gaia
LanguageData.Orassan_GaiaChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a Gaia planet; a planet perfectly suited for nearly any carbon based life form. [PAWN_pronoun] benifited from a near perfect enviroment to grow up in.
LanguageData.Orassan_Ecumenopolis.title: Bambino dell'ecumenopoli
LanguageData.Orassan_Ecumenopolis.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a planet sized city. [PAWN_pronoun] had to grow up with a population of potentially trillions, crowded condtions, and a lifestyle geared towards industry and science.
LanguageData.Orassan_Gravity.title: Colonizzatore
LanguageData.Orassan_Gravity.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was from a high-gravity planet. As such, [PAWN_pronoun] is stronger then most.
LanguageData.Orassan_Climber.title: Scalatore
LanguageData.Orassan_Climber.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a climber as a kid, building strength by finding [PAWN_possessive] ways to tops of trees.
LanguageData.Orassan_Mud.title: Scavatore
LanguageData.Orassan_Mud.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a more temperate planet and could frequently be found digging in the mud as a child, excavating potholes in the garden. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned a little about re-planting, when [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to fix what was dug.
